main event: An unidentified object was observed in Fairfax, Virginia, described as far brighter than any star, with changes in shape and color.
interesting points: The object was gray on the inside and red on the outside,The observer noted the object appeared to change shape and sometimes disappeared and reappeared, It was suggested that the object could potentially be a satellite or an aircraft obscured by clouds, No sound was heard from the object, The observer experienced the object moving in front of and being obscured by tree branches.
sighted object: triangular object that appeared bright and changed shape
